sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RecordMemberBuilder</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RecordMemberBuilder</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RecordMemberBuilder = Class.create();
RecordMemberBuilder.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.members = {};
		this.debug = gs.getProperty("glide.ui.debug_record_member_builder", "false");
    },
	put: function(sysId, name, lastName) {
		sysId = sysId.trim();
		name = name.trim();
		
		if (this.debug === "true") {
			gs.log("#####################################");
			gs.log('members: ' + JSON.stringify(this.members));
			gs.log('sysId: ' + sysId);
			gs.log('name: ' + name);
			gs.log("#####################################");
		}
		
		if (sysId == "" || name == "" || JSUtil.nil(this.members) || this.members[sysId])
			return;

		// protect against truncated display name coming from sys_history_line.user_name
		if (name.endsWith('...')) {
			var u = GlideUser.resolveNameFromSysID(sysId);
			if (!GlideStringUtil.nil(u))
				name = u;
		}

		this.members[sysId] = {
			name: name,
			initials: GlideNGInitials.getInitials(name),
			last_name: lastName ? lastName.trim() : '',
			sys_id: sysId,
			record_is_visible: true
		};
	},
	getJson: function() {
		return JSON.stringify(this.members);
	},
    type: 'RecordMemberBuilder'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-12-21 22:11:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1a9c3bcd0b2223007bd12c6317673af1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RecordMemberBuilder</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NG shared components" source="com.glide.ui.ng">70ec74c36d2220100acb70b353433014</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1a9c3bcd0b2223007bd12c6317673af1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-22 16:31:29</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1157</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
